transcript_en:
Caller: Hello.
Agent: Ishant Kalyan, speaking from Doctor. Sir?
Caller: Yes, speak.
Agent: Ji, Namaskar, I am speaking from IndiaMART.com, Senior Manager. Sir, speak. You called for IndiaMART, sir?
Caller: This call came on the 22nd, sir. It must have been connected here.
Agent: Okay, okay.
call_summary: The agent is calling the customer back regarding a call made on the 22nd for IndiaMART. The customer acknowledges the call.

key_insights: The call is a callback from IndiaMART.
The purpose of the initial call is unknown.
